# .bashrc

# Source global definitions
if [ -f /etc/bashrc ]; then
    . /etc/bashrc
fi

# User specific environment
# PATH 설정: 기본적으로 $HOME/.local/bin과 $HOME/bin을 PATH에 추가
if ! [[ "$PATH" =~ "$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/bin:" ]]
then
    PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/bin:$PATH"
fi

# 추가적으로 /test 디렉토리를 PATH에 추가
PATH=$PATH:/test
export PATH

# Uncomment the following line if you don't like systemctl's auto-paging feature:
# export SYSTEMD_PAGER=

# User specific aliases and functions
# 기본적인 명령어에 대한 alias 설정
alias rm='rm -i'
alias cp='cp -i'
alias mv='mv -i'
alias vi='/usr/bin/vim'
alias grep='grep -i --color'
alias ip='ip --color=auto'

alias c="clear"
alias h="history"
alias t="/usr/bin/telnet 192.168.10.20"
alias d="cd /test"

alias sys="systemctl"

# Frequently used command with option
alias pps='ps -ef | head -1 ; ps -ef | grep $1'
alias qqq='echo $1'
alias df='df -hT'
alias chklog='cat $1 | egrep -i --color "(warn|error|fail|danger|alert|emerg)"'

# Firewall-cmd
alias fwcmd='firewall-cmd --permanent'
alias fwreload='firewall-cmd --reload'
alias fwlist='firewall-cmd --list-all'



# 원하는 사용자 정의 alias나 함수는 여기에 추가할 수 있습니다
# 예: alias ll='ls -la'

# blesh
# source ~/.local/share/blesh/ble.sh

# alias for server
# 	Apache
# 		- /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf
#		- /var/www/html
#		- /var/log/httpd(/etc/httpd/logs)
#	Nginx
#	Tomcat
# 	PostgreSQL
# 	MySQL
# 	MongoDB


#
# color
#
export LS_OPTIONS='--color=auto'
alias ls='ls $LS_OPTIONS'
alias ll='ls -al $LS_OPTIONS'
alias pcat='pygmentize -g'
#
# rsync Alias
#
alias RS='rsync -az --delete -e ssh'    # RS /backup/ main:/backup/server1
alias LS='rsync -a --delete'            # LS /backup/ /test100


LANG=en_US.UTF-8

#
# FTP Server Alias
#
alias FTP='cd /etc/vsftpd'
alias vsftpd.conf='vi /etc/vsftpd/vsftpd.conf'
alias ftpusers='vi /etc/vsftpd/ftpusers'
alias user_list='vi /etc/vsftpd/user_list'
alias slog='tail -f /var/log/secure'
alias flog='tail -f /var/log/xferlog'

#
# Mail Server Alias
#
alias MAIL='cd /etc/mail'
alias sendmail.cf='vi /etc/mail/sendmail.cf'
alias maillog='tail -f /var/log/maillog'

#
# Samba Server Alias
#
alias smb.conf='vi /etc/samba/smb.conf'
alias SMB='cd /etc/samba'
alias smblog='tail -f /var/log/samba/log.smbd'
alias nmblog='tail -f /var/log/samba/log.nmbd'

alias docker='podman'
